text:
Backend Software Developer (C++/C#)| Susquehanna International Group (SIG)| Philadelphia, PA| ONSITE and VISA Candidates Accepted| sig.com

We place software developers across all of our front, middle and back office teams. Throughout the interview process, we’ll discuss your skills and goals so we can match you with the team where you’ll be successful from day one.

If you’re a C++ or C# developer then we want to talk to you. No finance experience needed just the willingness to learn.

Interested in learning more? Email me at tim.lynott@sig.com and we’ll set up a time to talk.
